ModInfo.Name: xce (ZH)
ModInfo.Author: Sheepy
ModInfo.Description:
Chinese (Traditional) Translation for Xenonauts Community Edition v0.34.2.
Includes all X:CE mods that are enabled by default.
This mod should be placed above these mods:
Aegis Armor, Armoured Assault, Extended Weapon Descriptions for Fighters, Fire in the Hole, Geographic addition, Lore+, Xenonauts Fix Pack, X:CE Balance Adjustment, and X:CE Base Mod.
See mod home for more info: https://github.com/Sheep-y/xenonauts-ce_zh
